html:
11.1.22  5:08 pm   whats a bad cliche

      crime

11.1.22  4:48 pm   you know those chocolate candies with that nice crunch in the middle, twix?
do you prefer the left twix or right twix?

      it's impossible to define which is left and which is right, but they're both the same

11.1.22  4:12 pm   would you say the 4maj chord sounds reassuring?

      sometimes

11.1.22  4:02 pm   can i hear a .wav export of the "got my ticket" section of "ground plane"? please

      it sounds exactly the same as it does in the final video

11.1.22  3:15 pm   what do you think sums up the mood of a suspended chord

      the surrounding chords and all of the other surrounding context, both audio and visual

11.1.22  2:21 pm   is I'm a huge gamer most of the time a song about you or is it about the character in the video

      the character

11.1.22  2:10 pm   do you like to participate in mischievous activities  

      only when i'm not supposed to

11.1.22  12:40 pm   if harmony is so good why is there no harmony 2

      there's already way more than that

11.1.22  12:39 pm   Is C C E7 E7b5 Emin7b5 A7#5 D9 D the chord progression of being lovestruck?

     i'm sure it can be used that way

     Also what chords should come next? (two chords per measure)

      it's interesting you mention that, because, often, what should come next is to change how often the chords occur

11.1.22  12:29 pm   que pensez-vous de l'intolérance au lactoser

      i've heard that it's possible to actually lose your tolerance if you take a long break from it

11.1.22  11:53 am   What's your favourite arcade machine?

      the cash register

11.1.22  11:39 am   what are you doing

      flipping out

11.1.22  11:36 am   do you have any advice for making things sound the same way written out as they do in your head

      yes, write them out loud

11.1.22  11:27 am   did you do a bad thing?

      i have never done a thing

11.1.22  9:41 am   im tall and handsome

      i understand

11.1.22  8:29 am   How are babies made

      i couldn't even begin to imagine

11.1.22  7:23 am   What is your favorite letter?

      i don't recall

11.1.22  6:32 am   time passes at 98⅓% speed in my bedroom.

      compared to what

11.1.22  5:47 am   is the friend with the maroon shirt 'friend 1' or vice versa

      they don't have to have numbers, but, in the script, the one who buys the painting is labeled as f1 and the other one is f2

11.1.22  5:19 am   is flour edible sand?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.1.22  3:49 am   What type of object would you use to hold your candy when trick-or-treating?

      maybe a warehouse

11.1.22  2:35 am   Opinion on Halloween?

      the orange version of christmas

11.1.22  1:20 am   would you write a country song?

      sure

11.1.22  12:37 am   What's the worst possible thing you could find in a coffin? 

      more coffins





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

      how many do you want

      maybe a little bit of neither

      concerned

10.31.22  9:10 pm   are my questions getting through?

      i'll check

      it seems to be a very narrow range

10.31.22  6:24 pm   what constitutes a sound as music

      you

10.31.22  5:24 pm   HAPPY HALLOWEENIE do you celebrate it?

      no

10.31.22  4:08 pm   what is the biggest waste of time?

      something that no one has discovered yet because they don't have time to try

10.31.22  3:48 pm   hey bill, do you like going to the bakery?

      yes but i don't do it

10.31.22  2:57 pm   Do you like the sharp, flat or natural sign better?

      natural

10.31.22  1:15 pm   What does o.u.t.s.i.d.e. stand for?

      outside

10.31.22  12:53 pm   Have you ever dreamed of one or more alpaca?

      no

10.31.22  11:08 am   How to remember your name

      just keep changing it. that will keep you alert

10.31.22  10:28 am   Will any of these buildings standing today still be around in a thousand years?

      probably

10.31.22  9:29 am   can i learn how to do everything and be good at it?

     no but you can do a lot of things

     or do i hqve to pick?

     you can pick some things, and you can still change your mind

      no

      yes

10.31.22  6:52 am   would you learn to play the double contrabass flute if given the opportunity 

      no

      maybe later

      maybe next week

      no. soap is self explanatory

      why do so many people ask why so many people ask that

10.31.22  1:17 am   thoughts on airplanes

      i'm impressed

10.31.22  12:06 am   Do you have a favorite song that you wrote? Or do you like them al equally? :)

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.30.22  11:50 pm   Hey bill, hows it going? My mate and I wrote a question in the last week-ish and have since forgotten what it was, so we can't find it. Anyway, we are going to just have to ask a new one. Why was the levee dry in American Pie?

      it's just what they're not supposed to be. these little surprises tend to go great in music songs or storytelling

10.30.22  11:46 pm   is the store in "at the corner store" based on an actual corner store

      visually in the video, yes. musically, no, the song is based on every location including non-stores
